agawinisuru shirani bandaranayaka mahathmiyata erehiwa idiripath karana lada doshabhiyogaye 14n 5k pamanak wibhagayata gena athi athara, eyin chodana 3kata aya waradikariya bawa wimarshanayen heli wi athi bawin, eki chodana agawinisurudhurayen aya iwath kirimata tharam pramanawath barapathala wisamachara chodana bawa parlimenthu wishesha karaka sabhawa kiya siti.doshabhiyoga chodanawa mangin agawinisuruwariyata ellawu anka 01,04 ha 05 yana chodanawalata idiripathwu wachika ha likhitha sakshi anuwa eki wisamachara chodana oppu wi athi bawada wishesha karaka sabhawa thiranaya kara thibe..wyawasthanukulawa  labadi thibu kala parichchedaya thuladi karaka sabhawe katayuthu nima kirime awashyathawaya salakillata gena 01,04 ha 05 yana wishamachara chodanawanta agawinisuruwariya waradakaru wi athi bawin anekuth chodanawanta waradikaruwakuda yanna soya balima nirarthaka karyayak bawata karaka sabhawa thiranaya kara bawa ehi sabhapathi parisara amathi anura priyadarshana yapa mahatha parlimenthuwedi pereda (08) pawathi madhya sakachchawakadi sadahan kaleya.pahatha sandahan chodanawalata aya waradikaruwi atha.01.selinko samuha wyaparayata ayath samagam wana selinko shri ram kapital manejmant, goldan ki kredit kad kampani saha finans and garanti kampani limitad yana samagamwalata erehiwa shreshtadhikaranaye pawara athi mulika ayithiwasikam ayadumpath anka piliwelin 262/2009, 191/2009 saha 317/2009 darana nadu shreshtadhikaranaye wenath winisuru mandullak wisin wibhaga karamin thibiyadi, eki nadu ema winisuru mandullen iwathkara, thama adhikaranaye wadidura wibhagaya sandaha gena ema nadu wibhaga kirim winisuru mandulle sabhapathi winisuru lesa katayuthu karamin ema naduwala wishayaya wasthuwak wanna wu selinko niwasa saha depala samagama namin handin wu, siti hawusin and riyal estet kampani limitad saha selinko kondominiyam limitad namin handin wu warthamanaye triliyam residansis namin handunwanu labana aayathanayata ayath, kolambaa 08, alwitigala mawathe, anka 153 darana sthanaye pihiti, shreshtadhikarana mulika ayithiwasikam ayadumpath anka 262/2009 darana naduwe depala layisthuw sandahan niwasa wyapruthiyen anka 2si/ef2/pi4 saha waripanam anka 153/1-2/4 darana niwasa, ostreliyawe, batahira ostreliya 6016hi, mawunt hothorn hi, ejina widiye, anka 127 darana sthanaye padinchi renuka niranjali bandaranayaka saha kapila ranjan karunarathna yana dedena wisin labadena lada prasiddha notharis ke.bi. aroshi pererage anka 823 darana wishesha atarni balapathraya upayogi karagena renuka niranjali bandaranayaka saha kapila ranjan karunarathna yana dedenage namata mila di ma ka da;04 ihatha ki endibi banku shakhawe ginum anka 106450013024, 101000046737, 100002001360, 100001014772, 100002001967, 100101001275, 100110000338, 100121001797 saha 100124000238 darana ginum nawayak athuluwa wiwidha bankuwala banku ginum wissakata adhika sankhyawak pawathwagena yamin, eki thorathuru adhikarana niladhariyeku wisin labadiya yuthu warshika wathkam saha barakam prakashaye sandahan nokirimen da;05.danata kolambaa mahesthrath adhikaranaya idiriye pawathina warsha 1994 anka 19 darana allas ho dushana pilibanda chodana wimarshanaya kirime komishan sabha panatha yatathe allas saha/ho dushana kriyawalata adala waradawal sambandhayen nithi kruthyayanwalata eki garu (aacharya) upathissa athapaththu bandaranayaka wasala mudiyanse ralahamilage shirani anshumala bandaranayaka mahathmiyage nithyanukula swamipurushaya wana pradip gamini suraj kariyawasam mahatha sakakaruweku wana heyin da; eki chodana weyi.ehidi adahas dakwu anura priyadarshana yapa mahatha,doshabhiyoga chodanawa wimarshanaya karana therim karaka sabhawa prathama wathawata nowambar 14raswiya.

kenek ekka api yam deyak gana ho siduwimak gana katha karana kota, ee katha karan de gana pahadiliwa niwaradiwa therun ganna nam api ekawara wachana kanen ahanna oona, katha karana swaraya (hangima) gana awabodhayak laba ganna oona, anga chalana gana watahimak thiyenna oona (samahara welawata kata boru kiwwath diwa boru kiyanne na wage wachana walin kiyana deta hathpasin wenas deyak anga chalana walin kenek kiyanna puluwan, athdakim athine hamotama...)

nisi lesa sura badu nogewannenam ema samagame nishpadana katayuthu thawakalikawa thahanam kara ema samagama sambandhayen nithyanukulawa katayuthu kala yuthuwa thibiyadi sura badu departhamenthuwa ese nokara mendis samagamata juni masaya sandahada nishpadana katayuthuwalata awasara laba di athi bawada wasantha samarasinha mahatha anawaranaya karayi.
